meanings.definition: Existing beyond what is obvious or admitted; intentionally hidden.
meanings.sent1: The ulteriorly motive behind his actions was finally revealed.
meanings.sent2: She had an ulteriorly plan to surprise her friend on her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ulteriorly hiding spot turned out to be inside the laundry basket.
meanings.sent4: His ulteriorly intentions cast a shadow of doubt over his true character.
meanings.sent5: The ulteriorly message in the painting was only decipherable by those who knew the artist well.

meanings.definition: In a way that is beyond what is seen or understood; secretly.
meanings.sent1: He whispered ulteriorly to avoid being overheard by others.
meanings.sent2: The treasure was hidden ulteriorly beneath the old oak tree.
meanings.sent3: The magician ulteriorly pulled a rabbit out of his hat to the audience's amazement.
meanings.sent4: The truth was ulteriorly lurking in the shadows, waiting to be revealed.
meanings.sent5: She smiled ulteriorly, knowing she had successfully kept her surprise party a secret.
